title: Exposing the TRUE Misinformation Superspreaders | Guests: Rep. Patrick McHenry & Rep. Chris Stewart | 4/8/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the upcoming 2022 midterms and the toss-up races to pay attention to. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss CNN+’s embarrassing launch and college students calling out CNN’s disinformation at a conference. Rep. Patrick McHenry joins to discuss the Federal Reserve’s move to create a digital dollar. Author Michael Malice joins Glenn to discuss the news of the day, including the misinformation being spread by our intelligence community and the mainstream media. Recovering investment banker Carol Roth joins to discuss her article “Creative ways to combat inflation.” Rep. Chris Stewart joins to discuss the information war against Russia and the U.S., even when our intel isn’t completely reliable.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
